title: THE LITTLE POLAR BEAR IN H.264 BY WINKER(ENG)(SPANISH AUDIO)
description:
english/spanish


This charming animated adventure follows a young polar bear, Lars, as he befriends Robbie, a seal. Together, these two form a friendship that proves different breeds of animals can get along perfectly well. And when a dangerous monster hits the waters and begins stealing all the fish, Lars and Robbie must team up with a variety of other animals to ensure that their friends and family won't be harmed. Based on the popular children's book series, 'The Little Polar Bear' is perfect family entertainment.
